he: א"ל רב חנין לרב אשי ואמרי לה רב חנין מחוזנאה לרב אשי ת"ש דתניא המוכר עבדו לעובד כוכבים יצא לחירות וצריך גט שחרור מרבו ראשון אמר רבן שמעון בן גמליאל בד"א שלא כתב עליו אונו אבל כתב עליו אונו זהו שחרורו
text: Rav Ḥanin said to Rav Ashi, and some say that it was Rav Ḥanin from Meḥoza who said this to Rav Ashi: Come and hear a solution that we learned in a baraita: With regard to one who sells his slave to a gentile, the slave is emancipated but nevertheless requires a bill of manumission from his first master. Rabban Shimon ben Gamliel said: In what case is this statement said? It is when the master did not write his document for the slave when he sold him; but if he wrote his document for him, that is the slave’s bill of manumission.
